## RestMiddleware interface

Definition of rest middleware that will be pluged in to processing of request and response

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RestMiddleware<TRequestBody = any, TResponseBody = any, TDescriptor = any, TTarget = any> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [run](./rest.restmiddleware.run.md) | [RestMiddlewareRunMethod](./rest.restmiddlewarerunmethod.md)<!-- -->&lt;TRequestBody, TResponseBody, TDescriptor, TTarget&gt; | Runs code that is defined for this rest middleware, in this method you can modify request and response |
